powerwalk.view

Class MapViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • powerwalk.view.MapViewer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MapViewer
extends java.awt.Canvas
    Canvas that the WorldMap is printed on to show the mapped areas in the Grid
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • showMapViewerStandAlone

        public static void showMapViewerStandAlone(boolean exitOnClose)
        Shows the World Map in a separate frame without loading the entire plug-in. This can be done without RSBot.
        Parameters:
        exitOnClose - when true, terminates the application when the window is closed
